DOC.brief_summary: It well document exercise-induced muscle damage ( EIMD ) decrease muscle function cause severe soreness discomfort . Branched-chain amino acid ( BCAA ) supplementation show increase protein synthesis decrease muscle protein breakdown , however , effect BCAAs recovery EIMD unknown . Thus , aim study examine effect BCAA supplement marker muscle damage .
DOC.brief_title: Exercise-induced Muscle Damage Reduced Resistance Trained Athletes Branch Chain Amino Acids
